awards.title: Government and Political Science Fellowship award
awards.awarder: School of Economic, Political and Policy Sciences (EPPS) at UT-Dallas
awards.summary: The Government and Political Science Scholarship was established in 2019 by the Political Science faculty. The scholarship is awarded to full- or part-time undergraduate students studying Political Science with a minimum GPA of 2.8. The amount of the award is $1,000.
